articles.description: The city has become a poster child for its compliance with COVID-19 pandemic health orders. A century prior, it was a hotspot for anti-mask sentiment.
articles.content:
San Francisco and the surrounding region has been lauded across the US for its stringent compliance with public health orders during the 2020 coronavirus pandemic.

articles.content:
